ygData.subject: Re: Salutations, gripes, and tricks
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Except the pattern was it happend at least 20 times right in a row, all successful. We would fight and then stop and heal together. Every time it would
ygData.messageBody:
>That's what I meant. Normally they will not stack, but lag
>somehow allowed you to bypass the server-side check (it's the
>same thing as the simultaneous transaction problem from
>computer science).
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>

Except the pattern was it happend at least 20 times right in a row, all
successful. We would fight and then stop and heal together. Every time it
would stack properly. The next day however we couldnt do it at all. I
highly doubt that we just got lucky over 20 times over the course of 3
hours. But then again yours is the best explanation ive heard. :p
